name: SHOOTING STRIKE 3D
description:
SHOOTING STRIKE 3D is an advanced and thrilling anti-terror shooting game. Here is full of classic but powerful weapons, gorgious battlefields. As well as the best of the Armed Forces. You must fight with courage and determination. mission accomplished. Become a anti-terror police hero.

Game control:
- Virtual joystick of left screen for moving, right screen spare area for aiming
- When you aim the target,your weapon will fire automatically,giving you a much easier FPS game control.
- You can prepare your bullets before battling,or auto buy bullet in the battle.

Game tips
- Auto shooting,you only need to do is to place the crosshair on the target,the best way to play FPS on portable devices.
- You can tweak your control sensivity in your pause menu
- Auto buying bullets in the battle,save your precious time
